name: Hardware AWGN generator using Box Muller
body:
This project is based on the finding established in the following paper with certain modifications in bit-widths:
[A Hardware Gaussian Noise Generator Using the Box-Muller Method and Its Error Analysis](http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/login.jsp?tp=&arnumber=1628955&url=http%3A%2F%2Fieeexplore.ieee.org%2Fxpls%2Fabs_all.jsp%3Farnumber%3D1628955)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
